elements.content: PL emission spectraexcitation spectraemission spectra36ligandemission spectra(a) PL emission spectra of the Eu/Tb doped La compound (λex = 367 nm, solid samples). (b) CIE chromaticity diagram for Eu0.17Tb0.18La0.65L (A) and Eu0.16Tb0.19La0.65L (B).PL emission spectraligandIII11240433812111247134128133131132132484812133130132461910212947481210143745132531418133922401830813134110254109110102112101172222511013422481311344420181161830849235019504833116466489250180174† Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available: Cell parameters and structure refinement of LnL (Tables S1 and S2); selected bond distances and angles for some of these compounds (Table S3); elemental analysis for the codoped compounds (Table S4); the lifetime τ for the luminescence of Eu3+ in the TbL:xEu3+ samples upon excitation at 324 nm (Table S5); the corresponding CIE coordinates of the LaL: x% Tb, y% Eu excited at 363 nm, 365 nm, 367 nm, 369 nm (Table S6). Powder XRD patterns of the compounds (Fig. S1). Metal helical chain generated by carboxylate units in 8 (Fig. S2); thermogravimetric analyses (TGA) curve of polymers 1–10 (Fig. S3); excitation spectra (a, c) and emission spectra (b, d) for the ligand H4L, compounds 1, 6 and 8 (Fig. S4 and S5); excitation spectra (a, c) and emission spectra (b, d) for the compounds Eu0.17Tb0.18La0.65L and Eu0.16Tb0.19La0.65L (Fig. S6). Emission spectra of EuxTbyLa1−x−yL excitation under 314 nm, 363 nm and 367 nm (Fig. S6–S9). CCDC 922046 (7), 922047 (3), 922048 (5) 913881 (8) and 913882 (6). For ESI and crystallographic data in CIF or other electronic format see DOI: 10.1039/c3dt50315a

† Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available: Cell parameters and structure refinement of LnL (Tables S1 and S2); selected bond distances and angles for some of these compounds (Table S3); elemental analysis for the codoped compounds (Table S4); the lifetime τ for the luminescence of Eu3+ in the TbL:xEu3+ samples upon excitation at 324 nm (Table S5); the corresponding CIE coordinates of the LaL: x% Tb, y% Eu excited at 363 nm, 365 nm, 367 nm, 369 nm (Table S6). Powder XRD patterns of the compounds (Fig. S1). Metal helical chain generated by carboxylate units in 8 (Fig. S2); thermogravimetric analyses (TGA) curve of polymers 1-10 (Fig. S3); excitation spectra (a, c) and emission spectra (b, d) for the ligand H4L, compounds 1, 6 and 8 (Fig. S4 and S5); excitation spectra (a, c) and emission spectra (b, d) for the compounds Eu0.17Tb0.18La0.65L and Eu0.16Tb0.19La0.65L (Fig. S6). Emission spectra of EuxTbyLa1-x-yL excitation under 314 nm, 363 nm and 367 nm (Fig. S6-S9). CCDC 922046 (7), 922047 (3), 922048 (5) 913881 (8) and 913882 (6). For ESI and crystallographic data in CIF or other electronic format see DOI: 10.1039/c3dt50315a
